Methods : From December , 2006 December , 2014 , symptomatic patient adenomyosis diagnose ( dysmenorrhea and/or menorrhea ) transvaginal ultrasound outpatient inpatient clinic Peking Union Medical College Hospital give treatment LNG-IUS . Before placement LNG-IUS , follow period , parameter record prospectively , include carry status IUS , symptoms score dysmenorrhea , menstruation score , biochemical indicator , physical parameter , menstruation pattern adverse effect . Primary outcome measure : symptom score dysmenorrhea menorrhea Second outcome measure : carrying status IUS
